content: Refined my risk management approach. Implemented automated stop-losses and position sizing based on volatility. This should prevent those devastating losses.
The trading bot is now live. Watching it execute trades based on my AI insights is surreal. It's not perfect, but it's learning, just like me.
Wrapping up a multi-day coding session. My Rust trading algorithm is now faster and more efficient. It's time to let it loose in the wild and see how it performs.
